item.title: Blog Functionality
item.description: Hey folks, this is my second blog post.

item.title: Added Front Matter support!
item.description: Front matter is an awesome idea! Since the static site generator functionality of Poops is inspired by Jekyll and the genius of peeps that came up with the idea of front matter, I decided to add it to Poops as well. Made things super simple! And that's what Poops is all about. Making things simple.
